option-result pair.name: fortune stick 1
option-result pair.wealth: Beware of risky financial ventures. Impulsive decisions may lead to financial loss. Exercise caution and seek advice before making significant investments.
option-result pair.career: A period of stagnation in your career may be ahead. Embrace this time as an opportunity for self-reflection, skill development, and exploring new avenues.
option-result pair.health: Neglecting your well-being will have consequences. Prioritize self-care and seek professional guidance for any health concerns that arise.
option-result pair.relationship: Miscommunication may strain your relationships. Practice active listening, express yourself clearly, and seek resolution through open and honest dialogue.

option-result pair.relationship: Relationship conflicts may arise. Approach disagreements with empathy, understanding, and a willingness to find common ground.
